metabase
Class NodeBase

java.lang.Object
  resources.RootClass
      metabase.NodeBase

public class NodeBase
extends RootClass

This class handle the list of tap nodes TapNode. Tap node are stores in a NodeMap Node base is built on the single instance pattern. Tap nodes must always be acceded through this class

Version:
$Id: NodeBase.java 62 2011-10-04 15:17:34Z laurent.mistahl $
Author:
laurentmichel
